item.description:
I have been wanting to see a dance production, how about this; dance with originally scored music by CT composers!!

Full Force Dance Theatre: Body Electric

A unique collaboration between Full Force Dance Theatre and five Connecticut area composers. Each composer will write an electronic, or electro-acoustic, work for the evening. FFDT Artistic Director Katie Stevinson-Nollet will choreograph original dance works in collaboration with each composer. The five composers are Leif Ellis, Alphonse Izzo, Matt Sargent, Kathryn Swanson and Karl Warner. Tickets: $20 general admission, $10 seniors, Charter Oak and Let*s Go Arts! Members, $5 students
http://uhaweb.hartfor...

Free parking is available in the lot across the street from the center at 330 Main Street and at Betances School located diagonally across the street.
There is also metered parking available on the street in front of the Cultural Center and on Prospect Street. These spots are free after 6:00 pm Monday through Friday and on the weekends.
Free spaces can be found further down Charter Oak Avenue and on Charter Oak Place.

A security escort to parking areas is available upon request.
item.how_to_find_us: Meey in front lobby at 7:00, will wear the bw scarf with piano keys.
item.name: Full Force Dance Theatre: Body Electric
